sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const ProfileInfo = ( {person = { firstName: 'Jose', lastName: 'Annunziato', handle: 'jannunzi', profilePicture: 'jose.png', bannerPicture: 'polyglot.png', bio: 'Faculty, Software Engineer, AI, Space, and renewable enthusiast. Retweets and likes are not endorsements.', website: 'youtube.com/webdevtv', location: 'Boston, MA', dateOfBirth: '7/7/1968', dateJoined: '4/2009', followingCount: 312, followersCount: 180, } }) => { return(
{person.firstName} {person.lastName}

{person.bio}

{person.location}
); } export default ProfileInfo;
